exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) l2 : list (Term A n) Unable to unify "pluspf nil l2" with "l2".
Wrong bullet --: Current bullet -- is not finished.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) t1 : Term A n l1' : list (Term A n) IHl1' : plusP l1' nil (pluspf l1' nil) Unable to unify "pluspf (t1 :: l1') nil" with "t1 :: l1'".
Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.

original: intros l1 l2. induction l1 as [|t1 l1' IHl1']. -- simpl. apply nillu1. -- destruct l2 as [|t2 l2']. ++ simpl. apply nillu2. ++ simpl. destruct (ltT_dec (A:=A) ltM t2 t1) as [Ht | [Ht | Heq]]. ** apply mainu1. auto. apply IHl1'. ** apply mainu2. auto. apply IHl1'. ** subst. apply mainu3; auto.
